question: Are there any weight restrictions for pets in hotels managed by Blu Hotels?
answer:
In all the hotels, managed by Blu Hotels, only small and medium pets - whose weight is equal or
less than 15kg - are welcome, when they are accompanied by their owners.
answer_reformulate:
["All hotels supervised by Blu Hotels happily welcome compact and mid-sized pets - not exceeding fifteen kilogrammes in weight - provided they're accompanied by their respective owners.

", 'The establishments under the administration of Blu Hotels are open to accepting small sized animals, weighing 15kg or less, as long as these creatures are accompanied by their proprietors.

', 'Throughout all hotels overseen by Blu Hotels, only diminutive and intermediate pets that do not exceed a weight of fifteen kilograms will be permitted to stay - granted they come with the people who call them family.

', 'Each hotel run under the supervision of Blu Hotels will allow tiny and moderate-sized domestic animals - as long as their weight is equal or less than 15kg, into their premises - but only if accompanied by their masters.

', "All of the hotels that operate according to the rules set out by Blu Hotels are pet-friendly places for small sized creatures weighing 15kg or less - provided they're joined by their companions throughout their stay.

", 'In every single hotel that operates under the watchful eye of Blu Hotels, it is mandatory for tiny and moderate-sized pets to be accompanied by their masters if they wish to enter the premises - a weight limit of 15 kilograms being strictly enforced. 

', 'Blu Hotels affiliated establishments have an open door policy for small sized animals weighing fifteen kilogrammes or less as long as these creatures are accompanied by their owners at all times.

', 'The hotels run under the administration of Blu Hotels will only allow tiny, moderate-sized pets that do not exceed a weight of 15kg to stay within their premises - but only if their masters travel alongside them.

', 'All of the establishments that operate according to the guidelines set out by Blu Hotels are happy to welcome small sized animals into their midst - as long as these creatures weigh fifteen kilogrammes or less and come accompanied by their masters.']
question_reformulate:
['
